model.name: Amblyopia Saber
model.description: A PC Beat Saber mod that allows you to adjust the visibility and positioning of notes per-eye. This mod was commissioned by artemonster, and is intended to help people with amblyopia and other vision issues play Beat Saber. Last updated for Beat Saber 1.16.2 - more info on the [GitHub page](https://github.com/legoandmars/AmblyopiaSaber/).

model.name: Friday Night Funkin Pack
model.description: A Friday Night Funkin model and map pack for Beat Saber! This model pack contains: custom notes, sabers, an energy bar, and 7 platforms. Additionally, all 22 songs from the OST have been charted in easy, hard, and expert+ so everybody can play! Quest version can be found [here](https://quest.bobbie.dev/FNFPack). If you like this pack consider joining my [patreon](https://www.patreon.com/bobbievr)!

model.name: LGBT Notes (Lesbian)
model.description: Happy pride month, lesbian people are extremely valid!

model.name: LGBT Notes (Trans)
model.description: Happy pride month, trans people are extremely valid!

model.name: LGBT Notes (Bi)
model.description: Happy pride month, bi people are extremely valid!

model.name: LGBT Notes (Rainbow)
model.description: Happy pride month, gay people are extremely valid!

model.name: Friday Night Funkin Health Bar
model.description: Health bar from Friday Night Funkin for the [CustomEnergyBars mod](https://github.com/ckosmic/CustomEnergyBars/releases/latest) that bumps to the music! Note Icon by Banic.

model.name: Goose Neck
model.description: A goose that extends its neck to comical lengths the more health you have. Works with the [CustomEnergyBars mod](https://github.com/ckosmic/CustomEnergyBars/releases/latest).

model.name: EXP Bar
model.description: EXP Bar from Minecraft for the [CustomEnergyBars mod](https://github.com/ckosmic/CustomEnergyBars/releases/latest). Sets the XP level to your current health percentage.

model.name: Rainbow Health Bar
model.description: A Rainbow Hue-Shifting health bar for the [CustomEnergyBars mod](https://github.com/ckosmic/CustomEnergyBars/releases/latest).

model.name: Static Notes
model.description:
BLASPHEMY AGAINST THE HOLY SPIRIT. Loosely inspired by Dogma from The Binding Of Isaac: Repentance. 

SEIZURE WARNING: These notes contain rapidly flashing textures.

model.name: Minecraft Health Bar
model.description: A Minecraft Health Bar for the [CustomEnergyBars mod](https://github.com/ckosmic/CustomEnergyBars/releases/latest). Features proper health rounding to the nearest half heart and "hardcore" hearts for energy bar/instafail modes

model.name: Drip Notes
model.description: DRIP NOTES DRIP NOTES DRIP NOTES. Original among drip model made by [RTFKT Studios](https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/among-drip-04f3d7452bac4799bcab779e21d60f16).

model.name: Amelia Wallson
model.description: Some Amelia Watson custom walls based on [Walfie's](https://twitter.com/walfieee) chibi Amelia.

model.name: BeatKhana Notes
model.description: Some custom notes based on the [BeatKhana](https://www.twitch.tv/beatkhana) logo. They do some pretty cool events, check out their stuff if you have a chance.

model.name: Ornament Notes
model.description: Festive ornament notes with dark, glowy arrows and metallic tops. These notes were made for the [QuestBoard](https://discord.gg/d6DyW9v) Christmas Event.

model.name: Gingerbread Walls
model.description: Gingerbread walls topped with gumdrops, icing, and licorice. These walls were made for the [QuestBoard](https://discord.gg/d6DyW9v) Christmas Event.

model.name: Candy Cane Walls
model.description: Some delicious looking candy cane walls to get you in the christmas spirit. These walls were made for the [QuestBoard](https://discord.gg/d6DyW9v) Christmas Event. [Original Materials by JulioVII](https://juliovii.itch.io/foodpk01)

model.name: Persona 5 Walls
model.description: Persona-inspired walls that use the color scheme of Persona 5.

model.name: Persona 4 Walls
model.description: Persona-inspired walls that use the color scheme of Persona 4.

model.name: Persona 3 Walls
model.description: Persona-inspired walls that use the color scheme of Persona 3.

model.name: Spaghet Cat Notes
model.description: Don't be upsetti, have some spaghetti! These notes were commissioned by DROID.

model.name: Spaghet Cat Walls
model.description: Don't be upsetti, have some spaghetti! These walls were commissioned by DROID.

model.name: Voxel Notes
model.description: Voxel notes and bombs that snap to a grid. Use the pixel walls included with custom walls for optimum voxel immersion. Original shader by Ikeiwa.

model.name: Wallfles
model.description: Scrumptious looking waffle walls (that don't fall over, unfortunately). [Original Materials by JulioVII](https://juliovii.itch.io/foodpk01)

model.name: Emoji Notes
model.description: A note that includes 25 different emojis! Also includes a beta version of a mod called ModelSettings that lets you easily select what emojis you want to use. The mod creates a 'Model Settings' button directly under the note previews - there's also a random option for maximum emojified chaos! To install, simply extract the downloaded zip directly into your Beat Saber folder.

model.name: Reverse Ghost Walls
model.description: Simulates the effects of ghost notes, but on a wall (and in reverse!). Goes well with the reverse ghost notes I made.

model.name: Reverse Ghost Notes
model.description: Simulates the effects of ghost notes, but in reverse (and with bombs!). Goes well with the reverse ghost walls I made.

model.name: Candy Cane Notes
model.description: Some delicious looking candy cane notes to get you in the christmas spirit. [Original Materials by JulioVII](https://juliovii.itch.io/foodpk01)

model.name: Wallet Notes
model.description: Some wallet notes with falling money trails. Made for black friday (under the premise that it didn't suck, but unfortunately this year kind of did)

model.name: Turkey Notes
model.description: Happy thanksgiving! Do you really like (or really hate) turkeys? Perfect, here are some notes to ensure thanksgiving-related bliss. Thanks to Okachamie for the turkey model.

model.name: Chattering Teeth
model.description: Chattering teeth notes to haunt your dreams. Comes with two versions, a normal version and one with chattering teeth audio. [Original model by Damco](https://skfb.ly/VTXu)

model.name: Curved Walls
model.description: Walls that curve towards the player. It's hard to do the effect justice with a picture or video, but they look really really cool ingame - just go try them! Goes well with the curved notes I made.

model.name: Curved Notes
model.description: Did somebody say... more cursed notes? These notes curve towards the player. Goes well with the curved walls I made.

model.name: Split Eye Notes
model.description: More brain-hurting notes, these make it so the left notes only appear in the left eye, and right notes only appear in the right eye. Inspired by Tachrayonic's stereo blocks.

model.name: Old Bombs
model.description: A recreation of the bombs from the original Beat Saber gameplay teaser.

model.name: No Notes
model.description: Made for No Note November. Literally just no notes.

model.name: Bandana Bullet Kin Notes
model.description: Notes of the Bandana Bullet Kin from Enter the Gungeon. Original model: https://skfb.ly/6ALsF

model.name: Matrix Notes
model.description:
"The Matrix is everywhere. It is all around us."
These notes have a really cool matrix code effect. Pair with my matrix code walls for maximum immersion!

model.name: Rainbow Notes
model.description: william gay

model.name: Don-chan Notes
model.description: Hate drums more than cubes? It's your lucky day.

model.name: Upside Down Notes
model.description: These are really really *really* hard to read. Good luck.

model.name: Scoresaber Notes
model.description: PP go BRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR

model.name: Jello
model.description: Wiggly jello notes that use dynamic bones.

model.name: Skewed Notes
model.description: In Beat Saber 1.12, the UI was changed forever when a dev hit Ctrl + I over the entire game, and ever since then the notes have felt suspiciously normal. Thankfully, I've fixed this with my newest notes.

model.name: Country Flag Notes
model.description: A note for every single country's flag! Also includes a beta version of a brand new mod that lets you easily select what flags you want to use. The mod creates a 'Model Settings' button directly under the note previews - there's also a random option for maximum vexillological chaos! To install, simply extract the downloaded zip directly into your Beat Saber folder.

model.name: Spinny Name Pack
model.description: One spinny name not enough for you? How about... four? This pack contains a spinny name saber, platform, note, and wall. You can customize your spinny name's text, font, glow, speed, and more! Make sure to check out all the "SpinnyNamePlus" options under Mod Settings. To install, just extract the zip directly into your base game folder (not a subfolder!)

model.name: Fall Guys Pack
model.description: A fan-made Beat Saber Fall Guys model + map pack! This model pack contains: platforms, notes, sabers, walls, and hitsounds. The entire Fall Guys OST has also been charted and is included! If you're confused on how to install this pack, click the Installation button for a tutorial.

model.name: Solar System Pack
model.description: Model Citizens is a group of 3d modelers set on creating quality model packs for the Beat Saber community to enjoy. Our first official release is the Solar System pack, which contains over twenty models based around the small galaxy we all call home. Everything in this pack was modeled especially for it, and there's tons of variety - sabers, platforms, notes, walls, and avatars! To install this pack, simply extract it into your base game folder.

model.name: DDR Saber
model.description: A Beat Saber model pack that adds DDR-inspired notes and platforms. This model pack is meant to be used with Feet Saber, so download Naluluna modifiers if you haven't already. It also comes with a mod that modifies the note rotation to be more realistic.

model.name: Minecraft Wall Pack
model.description: The Beat Saber Minecraft wall pack contains 10 walls. 3 are animated, and 2 have custom colors.

model.name: Matrix Code
model.description:
"The Matrix is everywhere. It is all around us."
These walls have a really cool matrix code effect.

model.name: Step Back Wall
model.description:
A blast to the past. If you remember what these are, you are eligible for a veteran's discount.

This model contains two versions: one uses camera distance to simulate the original step back wall effect, and the other one uses the normal texture.
